projects.name: Colors Project
desc: The COLORS app is a cutting-edge development and design project that revolutionizes color interaction. It features random color generation, color palette creation, gradient generation, and template previews.

Users can instantly discover new color combinations, create harmonious palettes, produce captivating gradients, and visualize colors on templates. This app empowers designers and artists to explore and unleash their creativity with ease and precision.

projects.name: Local Restaurant Page
desc: Local Restaurant Page was a renewal of Galeria Restaurant old Page to make it look modern and classy.
This project was done with vanilla css and js.

projects.name: Exam Solving Page
desc: The EXAM SOLVING PAGE is a backend service that simplifies boring and pointless process of taking exams on a certain webapge.

This project was done solely to simplify my and my classmates life. It required analyzing and understanding target website, gathering proper answers, and creating simple backend structure with a proper authentication mechanism and Admin Panel for managing users.
